title: WIFI Free Zone
tipUsoServicio: To continue, you must read and accept the terms of use
formParrafo: Now you can use the username and password provided by the establishment
_condiciones: Trozo de texto sobre la aceptación o no de las condiciones de uso
condAcepto: You have accepted the terms of use
condNoAcepto: You must accept the terms of use to be able to navigate
condElse: You have closed the window. You will not be able to navigate while you do not accept the conditions
_idioma: Parte de todo lo relacionado con el cambio de idioma
_ayuda: Parte para la página de ayuda
hPar1: In order to use our WIFI service, you must first read the conditions of use, for this you will have to press the 'USE OF SERVICE' button as shown in the image.
hPar2: A window will open with the terms of use of the service, which you can accept if you agree, or reject otherwise, you will find the buttons at the end of the terms and conditions, as shown in the image. Remember that if you do not accept the conditions you will not be able to use the service.
hPar3: Once accepted the conditions of use, you can already enter the username and password provided by the establishment, and then you can click on 'ENTER'.
elUltimoQueCierre: Este es el último atributo, añadir todos los atributos por encima de éste.
